Event1.description: Event to fire on TargetList1. Events continued: 11:Return 12:Destroy 13:Start_Moving 14:Reset 15:Rise 16:Descent 17:Start 18:Invert 19:Clear

TargetList0.description: The first list of objects to group

TargetList1.description: The second list of objects to group

TargetList2.description: The third list of objects to group

TargetList3.description: The fourth list of objects to group

TriggerList.description: Triggers the event(s) upon interacting with the object(s)

Extra.name: An object which groups objects to trigger an event. Commonly used to trigger an event after killing enemies.
